Data::Perl::Counter(3) User Contributed Perl Documentation Data::Perl::Counter(3)

NAME

Data::Perl::Counter - Wrapping class for a simple numeric counter.

VERSION

version 0.002011

SYNOPSIS

  use Data::Perl qw/counter/;
  my $c = counter(4);
  $c->inc;   # $c == 5
  $c->reset; # $c == 0

DESCRIPTION

This class is a simple consumer of the Data::Perl::Role::Counter role, which provides all functionality. You probably want to look there instead.

AUTHOR

Matthew Phillips <mattp@cpan.org>
